sentences.sContent: The name of the cheese is Dolcelatte, literally meaning ‘sweet milk’.
sentences.sCn: 这种奶酪名叫Dolcelatte，字面意思是 “甜牛奶” 。

sentences.sContent: I said I felt like quitting, but I didn’t mean it literally (= I did not mean exactly what I said )!
sentences.sCn: 我是说我不想干了，但并不是真的不干了！

words.tran: 文字的；逐字的；无夸张的
拘泥于字句；直译主义；彻底写实主义
文字，字义上；无修饰；表面意义上
拘泥于字句；照字面意义解释

trans.tranCn: 照字面意义； 逐字地；确实地， 真正地 A
trans.tranOther: according to the most basic or original meaning of a word or expression
